shibboleth.data.sql

Class CommitInfoStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • shibboleth.data.sql.CommitInfoStore

  • public class CommitInfoStore
extends java.lang.Object
    This class acts as data layer for committer information. Generally, committer information, such as authorship information is extracted from a cloned repository. This class can be used to store this in a Sql database.
    Author:
    Wilco Wisse

      • insert

        public void insert(GitFile file)
        Put a file in the db buffer.
        Parameters:
        file - The file in a repository.

      • insert

        public void insert(Committer committer)
        Put a committer in the db buffer.
        Parameters:
        committer - The committer to store.

      • insert

        public void insert(Chunk chunk)
        Put a chunk in the db buffer. The committer and the files belonging to this chunk are stored as well.
        Parameters:
        chunk - The chunk to store.

      • getFileId

        public int getFileId(GitFile file)
              throws java.sql.SQLException
        Get the database record id of the given file.
        Parameters:
        file - The file
        Returns:
        the id of the given Gitfile if the file exists in db, otherwise -1.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getCommitterId

        public int getCommitterId(Committer committer)
                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        Get the database record id of the given committer.
        Parameters:
        committer - The committer
        Returns:
        the id of the given committer if the committer exists in db, otherwise -1.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • writeToDB

        public void writeToDB()
        Flush the committer, file and chunk buffers to the database. In general no item is stored if the item is already present in the database.

      • getCommitters

        public java.util.List<Committer> getCommitters(java.lang.String repo)
        Returns:
        All committers which contributed to the given repo.

      • insertRecordLink

        public void insertRecordLink(RecordLink link)
        Store a RecordLink in the database.
        Parameters:
        link -
